On this page

Developer Documentation ​

Welcome to the Centabit v0.5 developer documentation.

Quick Links ​

Getting Started ​

  • Quick Start - Set up your development environment

Architecture ​

  • Overview - System architecture and design patterns
  • Data Flow - How data flows through the app
  • User Filtering - Multi-user support implementation
  • Sync Strategy - Offline-first sync approach
  • State Management - Cubit patterns and reactive streams
  • Evolution - v0.4 to v0.5 migration

Development ​

  • Overview - Development workflows
  • Adding Features - Feature implementation guide
  • Patterns & Conventions - Code standards
  • Database Schema - Drift database schema
  • Dashboard Case Study - Real-world example

API Reference ​

  • Overview - API documentation
  • Models - Domain models
  • Repositories - Data repositories
  • Cubits - State management

Contributing ​

  • Guidelines - How to contribute
  • Code of Conduct - Community guidelines
  • Development Workflow - Git workflow and PR process
  • Design Contributions - UI/UX contributions
  • Testing Guidelines - Testing practices
  • Documentation Guide - Documentation standards

Roadmap ​

  • Overview - Project roadmap
  • Features - Current and future features

Tech Stack ​

  • Framework: Flutter 3.x with Dart
  • State Management: flutter_bloc (Cubit pattern)
  • Database: Drift (SQLite)
  • Models: Freezed (immutable data classes)
  • DI: get_it
  • Routing: go_router
  • Charts: fl_chart
  • Logging: talker_flutter

Architecture Highlights ​

  • Feature-first organization
  • MVVM architecture pattern
  • Repository pattern with broadcast streams
  • Offline-first with background sync
  • Type-safe everything (Freezed + Drift)
  • Multi-user ready with userId filtering

Ready to contribute? Start with the Quick Start guide or browse the sidebar for specific topics.
